title: RR campus hostel
content: "I have a question about the hostel. If someone lives in the same city or has a local guardian, are they denied access to the hostel? Also, I wanted to know about the girls' hostel. Is it expensive considering the facilities it provides?"

comments.body: No they will not deny you , and also every hostelite has to have a local guardian to be able to stay in hostel. Yes, it is quite expensive and the food is just abysmal with only a singular option for a mess (whereas boys have 3 choices) , not only that the wifi is slow most of the time, the only good part about girls hostel is that it has a designated studying area, that boys hostel does not have and the curfew time is just 7pm, so a lot of restrictions have been put into place .  And Girls hostel is not inside the university unlike boys hostel, it's a few kms away across several areas (different blocks) and bus service from hostel to college (vice-versa) is provided.
Heyy there to your knowledge would you say it's better to take pg or hostel from ,btw thankyouuuâœ¨ you've been great assistance

I'd say better to take a pg, but hostel does provide more safety and control  and such. 

If you want to check out pgs do check out Stanza Living.
